title: SeA1:K
text: Recognize and understand the interaction between oneâ€™s own thoughts and emotions. (Critical Thinking)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can classify emotions as either comfortable or uncomfortable.
I can be aware of how my body feels when I have different emotions.

title: SeA2:K
text: Develop a positive identity and recognize personal strengths, interests, values, and challenges. (Creative Thinking)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can list things I do well (strengths) and things I like (interests).
I can recognize when things are hard for me and that it is okay to make mistakes, or ask for help.
I can identify a value/something important to me.
I can recognize how I have similarities with others as well as how I am unique.
